title: raamaraama bhadhrachala
sahitya:
rAma rAma bhadrAcala dhAma rArA



caraNam 1



 rAma rArA nI mOmipuDE prEma dIra jUtugAni 

tAmasamu valadu rAmasvAmi tALa jAla nikanu



caraNam 2



 ennaDu nE ninnu nammiyunna vADa nani yenci 

kannulEtti jUci nannu mannanatO brOva rArA



caraNam 3



 mATi mATiki nI tODi sATi vElpulu lErani  

cATu cunna nannu nIvI pATula beTTa nI TagunaTarA



caraNam 4



 bhadragiri rAmadAsa pAlakuDvai nIvEla  

chidramulella tolaginci bhadramuga nannElavEla
